meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bratty.
meanings.sent1: Her constant brattiness made it difficult to enjoy family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The child's brattiness was evident when he refused to share his toys.
meanings.sent3: Despite her brattiness, she always managed to charm her way out of trouble.
meanings.sent4: The brattiness of the spoiled princess was like a dark cloud over the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The teacher had to address the brattiness in the classroom to maintain order.

meanings.sent1: His brattiness often led to conflicts with his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The brattiness of the young boy was a challenge for his parents to handle.
meanings.sent3: The brattiness of the puppy was endearing to everyone in the family.
meanings.sent4: Her brattiness at the party was like a firework, drawing attention from all around.
meanings.sent5: The brattiness of the cat was evident in its refusal to obey any commands.
